channel.title: damianmullins
channel.description: Development Blog for Damian mullins – Web UI Engineer at JUST EAT.
channel.author: Damian Mullins

item.title: Learn React by building a web app — Week 7
item.description: It has been a busy two weeks of reading, listening to podcasts, and watching talks online. I did manage to make a few updates and bug fixes to Coinsly which I've listed in the sections below.

item.title: Learn React by building a web app — Week 5
item.description: Two posts in two days? Unheard of! It’s hackathon time at work so I have been spending my time working on the Coinsly app.

item.title: Learn React by building a web app — Week 4
item.description: It’s been a busy few weeks for me, at work and at home, so no real progress has been made on the Coinsly app. I did, however, manage to do a bit of reading, and watch a course, on various React related subjects.

item.title: Learn React by building a web app — Week 1
item.description: So, I decided a few months back that I'd like to learn a JavaScript framework this year. It's something I've wanted to for quite a while but I've always put it off for various reasons.

item.title: Building an app with React
item.description: So, I decided a few months back that I’d like to learn a JavaScript framework this year. It’s something I’ve wanted to for quite a while but I’ve always put it off for various reasons.

item.title: Unit testing front-end JavaScript with AVA and jsdom
item.description: Writing tests for JavaScript code that interacts with the DOM can be tricky. Luckily, using a combination of AVA and jsdom, writing those tests becomes a lot easier.

item.title: Configuring Babel 6
item.description: Babel 6 was released late last year and with it came some core changes. I put these slides together for a lightning talk at work whilst I was learning about these changes.

item.title: My podcast obsession
item.description: A few years back I discovered the wonderful world of podcasts, I subscribed to one or two and gradually over time the list has grown, I now subscribe to so many podcasts it's not even funny!

item.title: A look back and forward - 2016 edition
item.description: Looking back at the last year in 2015, and ahead to 2016.

item.title: Hack your Gmail address to stay organised
item.description: Tips and tricks to keep your email inbox organised, and hopefully empty!

item.title: Use PowerShell to npm uninstall all packages
item.description: Using PowerShell to overcome node_modules directory woes.

item.title: 2015 the year ahead
item.description: A quick rundown of 2014, and my plans and expectations for 2015.

item.title: My first week with Python, Django & Google App Engine
item.description: Walkthrough of a week spent working with Python, Django & Google App Engine.
